name: Hiveswap - TESTISIM
description:
HIVESWAP TESTISIM!! Is a continuation to Hiveswap Friendsim. Two new routes and friends to discover in Alternia. While you're stranded for more Hiveswap why not give this a shot?

Thank you for playing it if you did!

Art , coding and writing by @pi3shark on Twitter.

Music by Teknoaxe

Hiveswap and Hiveswap Friendsim are owned by What Pumpkin and we claim no ownership of the core game or assets used from the core game.
